meanings.definition: To taste food or drink carefully and appreciatively.
meanings.sent1: She degusts the soup to savor every flavor.
meanings.sent2: He degusts the wine before deciding to buy a bottle.
meanings.sent3: The chef degusts the ingredients like a scientist in a lab.
meanings.sent4: Her palate degusts the nuances of the dish like a connoisseur.
meanings.sent5: The food critic degusts each dish with a discerning eye.

meanings.definition: The act of tasting food or drink carefully and appreciatively.
meanings.sent1: The degusts of the cheese platter impressed the guests.
meanings.sent2: His degusts at the wine tasting event were well-known.
meanings.sent3: The degusts of the chocolate cake brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The degusts of the tea ceremony were a delight to watch.
meanings.sent5: Her degusts of the exotic fruits were a highlight of the trip.
